text: Cadwgan Ffol was a 13th-century Welsh poet. Little is known about him, and little of his work is thought to survive. The transcription of a poem commemorating a victory by the Welsh over the English fought at Degannwy (Iolo Morganwg manuscripts) has been attributed to him, but other historians have attributed it to Ednyfed Fychan. == References == Category:13th-century Welsh poets
title: Cadwgan Ffol
